title: (x) 'Col du Tourmalet': French road signage typeface - L4 aka Signal No 4 {Jan}
content:

author: ult

comments.content: [French road signage font L4, available as Signal from URW](http://web.archive.org/web/20100119161603/http:/www.urwpp.de/cgi-bin1/dalcgi/source/schnellsuche.htd?searchchar=signal).
thanks riccardo. The 'R' doesn't seem to marry up though.
excellent Jan, thank you very much

Looks more like Univers to me.

- Lex
